project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script to generate a random password that meets specified criteria, including the inclusion of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters, with a configurable length.

task.name: Allow user to configure the length of the password
Ensure the generated password meets the specified criteria (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters)
Write tests for the password generation functionality
Execute tests to validate the password generation
